title: Kevin Durant's Shocking Trade Request | Best of I AM ATHLETE Tonight Week Nine
description: NY Daily News NBA/Nets Writer Kristian Winfield discusses the surprising news that Kevin Durant wants out of Brooklyn. NFL linebacker KJ Wright visits to discuss his future, and who he would like to see as QB of the Seattle Seahawks. Marquette King discusses his situation as the free-agent Pro Bowl punter is still searching for work and a discussion on new media vs. old media.
author: smanderville@houseofathlete.com (Leger Douzable, Antoine Walker, Adam Jones, Brandon Marshall, Brandon Flowers, Chantel Tremitiere, LeSean McCoy, Kristian Winfield, KJ Wright, Marquette King)
